Is dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase deficiency inherited ?,"Dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase deficiency is inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern, which means both copies of the gene in each cell have mutations. Depending on the severity of these mutations, people with
